Name: Laser Focus
Description: Gain an Ashe. She gains 45% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

Name: Dynamic Defenses
Description: Gain a Gargoyle Stoneplate and a Blitzcrank. When he casts his Ability, its duration increases by 1 second per enemy targeting him.

Name: Justice Punch
Description: Gain a Galio. His Ability deals 50% more damage and knocks up its target for 2 seconds.

Name: Flaming Ricochet
Description: Gain a Gangplank. His Ability bounces to a second target dealing 75% damage.

Name: Divine Ascent
Description: Gain a Kayle. She gains bonuses per star level. 1: 40% Attack Speed 2: +2 Attack Range 3: Attacks fire 2 additional bolts dealing 50% damage.

Name: Growth Spurt
Description: Gain a Lulu. When she casts her Ability, she gains 100 bonus Health and 30 Ability Power (this can stack).

Name: Illuminating Singularity
Description: Gain a Lux. Every 2nd cast, her Ability deals 150% increased damage.

Name: Stacks on Stacks
Description: Gain a Nasus. He gains 20% Attack Damage, increased by 3% permanently each time he casts his Ability.

Name: Bigger, Better Buckler
Description: Gain a Poppy. She gains 150 Armor.

Name: Reign of Anger
Description: Gain a Renekton. He gains 40% Attack Speed and an additional 4% per 100 missing Health.

Name: Kingslayer
Description: Gain a Sylas. His Ability deals 50% more damage and restores 20% of his missing Health.

Name: Edgelord
Description: Gain a Talon. He gains 50 Ability Power. After killing an enemy, he restores 40 Mana.

Name: Re-Energize
Description: Gain a Wukong. When you field him, your team restores 50% of their Mana after their first cast each combat.

Name: Cyclone
Description: Gain an Annie. While her Ability's shield is active, enemies that attack her take 150 magic damage (once every 0.5 seconds).

Name: Adaptive Defensives
Description: Gain a Camille. She gains 30% Attack Damage. When she casts her Ability, she gains a shield equal to 250% of her Attack Damage for 3 seconds.

Name: League of Draven
Description: Gain a Draven. He gains 25% Attack Damage. When he kills an enemy, there is a 40% chance to gain 1 gold.

Name: Raider's Spoils
Description: Gain an Ezreal. Combat Start: Your strongest Ezreal grants his nearest ally a temporary Artifact for the rest of combat and gains 1 gold.

Name: Frontline Fencing
Description: Gain a Fiora. While her Ability is active, she gains 100 Armor and Magic Resist.

Name: Get Excited!
Description: Gain a Jinx. When she scores a takedown, she gains 100% Attack Speed and Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

Name: Flurry
Description: Gain a Lee Sin. He gains 40% Attack Speed, tripled for 3 seconds after casting his Ability.

Name: Rock Solid
Description: Gain a Malphite. He gains Ability Power equal to 40% of his Armor and his Ability's Armor duration is increased by 2 seconds.

Name: Hold the Line
Description: Gain a Rell. She gains 30 Ability Power and 20% damage reduction.

Name: Delivery Tips
Description: Gain a Sivir. Every Ability cast, she gains 1 gold with a 10% chance to gain 3 additional gold.

Name: Unrelenting Force
Description: Gain a Vi. When Vi takes or deals damage, she gains 2% Attack Damage, 2 Armor, and 2 Magic Resist, stacking up to 25 times.

Name: Siphoning Winds
Description: Gain a Yasuo. He gains 50% Omnivamp.

Name: Predatory Precision
Description: Gain a Yuumi. She gains 75% Critical Strike Chance and her Ability can critically strike.

Name: Smash!
Description: Gain an Alistar. He restores 5 Mana per second and his Ability hits all enemies within 1 hex.

Name: Energy Void
Description: Gain a Cho'Gath. Each time his Ability hits an enemy, he steals 25% of their Magic Resist.

Name: Relentless Assault
Description: Gain a Jax. After every 3rd attack, he gains 20% Attack Speed for the rest of combat (this can stack).

Name: Multi-Shot
Description: Gain a Kai'Sa. Every 2 attacks, she fires a bonus attack at a nearby enemy.

Name: Aim Assist
Description: Gain a LeBlanc. For every 2 sigils fired by her Ability, she fires an additional sigil at the lowest Health enemy.

Name: Gifted
Description: Gain a Nilah. She gains 40 Ability Power. Combat Start: Your strongest Nilah grants her nearest ally a temporary copy of one of her normal items.

Name: Spiked Shell
Description: Gain a Rammus. When struck by an attack, he deals magic damage equal to 100% of his Armor to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

Name: Reverberation
Description: Gain a Riven. She gains 20 Ability Power and her Ability is additionally cast on her lowest Health ally.

Name: Absolution
Description: Gain a Senna. She gains 20% Attack Speed and an additional 20% every 5 seconds.

Name: Power Grid
Description: Gain a Sona. She gains 20 Ability Power and her Ability fires 1 additional beam.

Name: Spread Shot
Description: Gain a Vayne. Her Ability additionally fires at 2 other nearby enemies dealing 35% damage.

Name: Frostburn
Description: Gain a Vel'Koz. His Ability deals an additional 200% of its damage over the next 30 seconds (this can stack).

Name: Double Bubble
Description: Gain a Zoe. Her Ability launches a second bubble at a different target, dealing 70% damage.

Name: Extinction Event
Description: Gain an Aurelion Sol. He gains 30 Ability Power and his Ability's meteors are larger.

Name: Back for Blood
Description: Gain a Bel'Veth. She gains 20% Omnivamp, tripled while under 50% Health.

Name: Resonance
Description: Gain an Ekko. He gains 20% Attack Speed and his attacks deal 50 bonus magic damage.

Name: Bunny Mercenary
Description: Gain a Miss Fortune. Her Ability covers a wider cone and she gains a 400 Health shield while channeling.

Name: Style & Flair
Description: Gain a Samira. She gains 20% Attack Damage. When she scores a takedown, she restores 35% of her maximum Mana.

Name: Glacial Prison
Description: Gain a Sejuani. Her Ability stuns for 0.5 seconds longer and enemies take 20% more damage while stunned.

Name: Shatter
Description: Gain a Sejuani. She gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist and her Ability hits the entire board.

Name: Punch Protocol
Description: Gain a Sett. He gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist. His Ability knocks back the first enemy struck, destroying them if knocked off the battlefield.

Name: Upgrade: Berserk
Description: Gain a Soraka. After 15 seconds of combat, all of her Ability casts are empowered.

Name: Stoneweaver
Description: Gain a Taliyah. She gains 30 Ability Power and her Ability deals 20% more damage to enemies above 1800 maximum Health.

Name: Heartstopper
Description: Gain a Viego. He gains 20 Ability Power and his Ability deals up to 50% increased damage based on the enemy's missing Health.

Name: Supersize
Description: Gain a Zac. He gains 800 bonus Health and is immune to crowd control.

Name: Shadow Jutsu
Description: Gain a Zed. He gains 10% Attack Damage. When he kills an enemy, he gains 10% of their Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

Name: Armor Piercing Rounds
Description: Gain an Aphelios. His attacks reduce the target's Armor by 10% for the rest of combat (this can stack).

Name: Traumatic Memories
Description: Gain a Fiddlesticks. When an ally dies, it gains 200 bonus Health for the rest of combat.

Name: Rapid Reporting
Description: Gain a Janna. Her Ability restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.

Name: Perfected Solar Flare
Description: Gain a Leona. She gains 30 Ability Power and her maximum Mana is reduced by 20.

Name: Not So Heavy Metal
Description: Gain a Mordekaiser. He gains 30 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

Name: They See Me Rolling
Description: Gain a Nunu. He gains 20 Ability Power and restores 10 Mana per second.

Name: Power Overwhelming
Description: Gain a Syndra. Allies summoned by her Ability gain 30% Attack Damage and 30 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist.

Name: Shiny
Description: Gain an Urgot. His Ability has an additional 25% chance to dredge up treasure.
